mdRecord.dcterms:title: List, "Negroes Belonging to George Washington in his own right and by Marriage", 1799 July
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, George, 1732-1799
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lists Mount Vernon slaves, their relationships, occupations, and place of residence on the estate -- a list of the negroes hired from Mrs. French. Autograph document, 8 pages, entirely in hand of George Washington, oversize document, laminated, George Washington's complete watermark. Date on original catalog card appears [1799][July]. [Probably prepared for information of his executors at the time he was drawing his will in July, 1799.]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Enslaved persons
French, Penelope Manley, approximately 1739-
